snippet: “The Last Ship” grew out of songwriting Sting has been doing for a musical of the same name, which producers hope will appear on Broadway in 2014.
abstract: “The Last Ship” grew out of songwriting Sting has been doing for a musical of the same name, which producers hope will appear on Broadway in 2014.

headline.main: Sting to Release a New Album in September
headline.print_headline: Sting Is Releasing an Album in the Fall
